-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Automated kind inference in Template Haskell.
--   
--   Given the name of a Haskell type, typeclass, type family, or any of
--   the above, determines its kind.
@package th-kinds
@version 0.1.1


-- | A module to infer the kind of a given type within Template Haskell.
--   Warning: this implements its own kind inference system, and is
--   therefore not guaranteed to work on all esoteric types. (That said, I
--   have no examples where it doesn't work.)
module Language.Haskell.TH.KindInference

-- | Returns either an error message or the <a>Kind</a> of the type
--   referred to by the specified name. Works with datas, newtypes, type
--   synonyms, type classes, data families, and type families.
--   
--   Note: There has been a bug observed in Template Haskell relating to
--   the parsing of types. This assumes that bug has been fixed, requiring
--   GHC at least 6.12.2.
inferKind :: Name -> Q (Either String Kind)
instance Eq KindAtom
instance Show KindAtom
instance Eq KindFunc
instance Show KindFunc
instance Ppr Char
instance (Ppr a, Ppr b) => Ppr (Either a b)
instance Ord Type
